title: (2380) - CM1442
description: WC, picnic tables, view of the river, beautiful place!

title: (2380) Malhou - CM1442
description: Parking lot of the Praia Fluvial Olhos D'Agua in an olive grove. Shady and flat places available. You have to try something out. At Praia Fluvial, which is about 3 minutes from the parking lot, there are toilets, cold showers, trash cans, a bar / restaurant and tent camping next to the river bath. There are no facilities at the parking lot itself. A road leads past the parking lot and is also used at night. It can be noisy at the weekend, as the Praia is very busy in summer. Unfortunately there is rubbish everywhere.

title: (2395-104) Minde - 308 Avenida São Sebastião
description: Very close to Intermarché

title: (2395-104) Minde - 425 Avenida São Sebastião
description: Gas station with washer and dryer

title: (2395) Minde - 2025 Estrada Nossa Senhora de Fátima
title_short: (2395) Minde - 2025 Estrada Nossa Senhora de Fátima
description: Parking on the edge of agglomeration, with the purring of the highway in the distance.

title: (2350) Pedrógão - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area at an old quarry with a great view. Ascent from the nature camp only with off-road vehicle / 4x4! Motorhome drivers, please take a look, 30 minutes on foot. Large flat surface made of bare rock

title: (2350) Pedrógão - 32 Rua Principal, R. do Arrife do Raro
title_short: (2350) Pedrógão - 32 Rua Principal, R. do Arrife do Raro
description: A few meters along the forest path there are several parking facilities. A little slope. Calm.

address.street: 32 Rua Principal, R. do Arrife do Raro

title: (2395) Minde - 103 Estrada Nossa Senhora de Fátima
title_short: (2395) Minde - 103 Estrada Nossa Senhora de Fátima
description: Nice public picnic area to protect. Small barbecue available. Ideal for children. A bit noisy because of the road. Beware no service or trash.

title: (2350) Pedrógão - R do Arrife do Raro
title_short: (2350) Pedrógão - R do Arrife do Raro
description: Place next to the picknick area, very nice and quiet. A lot of trees and you can do different hiking routes from here. Space for two campers next to the ‘road’.

title: (2486) Mira de Aire - 110 Avenida Mota Pinto
title_short: (2486) Mira de Aire - 110 Avenida Mota Pinto
description: Place with sloping parking, both day/night, above town and next to the football stadium.  Services available - electricity, water and drainage and parking to go to the nearby caves.

title: (2000) - A1
description: Free park dedicated to Motorhomes or vancampers, low noise because of location far from A1.

title: (2495) Fátima - IP1
description: Really nice rest area with 220v outlets for free, restrooms and water. Picnic tables also available.

title: (2485) Alvados -
description:
A big parking lot next to the Santo-Antonio cave. 
We spendt one night here. 
Litle traffic on the road, quiet and peaceful.

title: (2000) Pernes -
description: Parking next to a school. A little movement to be next to a national road.

title: (2485) Mira de Aire - 371 Rua Chão de Empires
title_short: (2485) Mira de Aire - 371 Rua Chão de Empires
description: Very nice place for 2 vans or 1 large camper. It is on the edge of a dirt road. Quiet night and beautiful morning with birdsong and a view of the "Ventas do Diabo". Please keep this site as clean as we did!

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Ample space to park for the night for multiple RVs/vans. Quiet spot with no homes in sight and an amazing lookout over the valley below. The only building nearby is the ticket office for the Alvado caves.

title: (2480-034) Alvados - Unnamed Road
description:
Park place next to the Alvados grotto. It is not specific for van but you can park for a quit night and no one will say anything. In the morning you can visit the grotto. 
you have a nice view to the mountains.

title: (2350) Torres Novas - 171 N3
description: Laundromat, right next door about 100m there is a continent good place to take advantage and go shopping

title: (2350) Torres Novas - 3 Avenida Doutor João Martins de Azevedo
title_short: (2350) Torres Novas - 3 Avenida Doutor João Martins de Azevedo
description: Large parking by the roundabout. Leveled. We didn't stay the night but think it would be possible. Short walk to the city center and castle. Don't try and park close to the castle if your vehicle is longer than 6 meters. The streets are very narrow and there's just not much space to park.

address.street: 3 Avenida Doutor João Martins de Azevedo

title: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
title_short: (2480) São Bento - Rua Luís de Camões
description: Free parking area above the town with 6 individually laid out bays. Each bay is fully serviced with electricity, water and drainage (electricity and water not working on our visit probably because the aire has only recently opened, November 2019).Lovely area, very quiet.

name: Camping Alvorão
title: (2350) Camping Alvorão
description: Camping Park you need CALL Numbers At placard to open door, safe place near Torres Novas you can go to the city center walking 10 min visit city castle

title: (2350) Torres Novas - 7 Avenida 8 de Julho
description: Nice park to visit city of Torres Novas. Near everthing, including the indoor market. Forbidden to park on Tuesdays because of local market outdoor market at this place. No water or supplies.

title: (2480-032) Alvados - 407 Rua Val do Bispo
description: A small place in the village with toilet and shower (cold) and drinking water. Too tight for large CC, only for smaller vehicles

title: (2490) Ourém - 667 Rua Principal
description: Small village with possibility to park during the day or overnight close to the church. Worth to visit the Dinosaurs Park with feet printings of some of the biggest dinosaurs on earth (Sauropedes) and a small Jurassic Park. Possible to park at the Dinosaurs Park.

title: (2480) Alvados -
description: Picnic park located next to the municipal road to Alvados. Equipped with WC and BBQ area. Everything very clean and taken care of. The bathrooms have electricity with a socket. There is also a small lagoon that is very low, perhaps due to the time of year. Close to hiking trails.

title: (2490) Ourém - Rua Principal
description: Nice quiet place in olive forest, no service available.

title: (2025-045) Alcanede - 8A Rua Manuel Alves Frazão
description: Very quiet spot next to the castle possible to visit it because the door is just blocked with a stone and Roman bridge a hundred meters away and another car park downstairs with 50 places

title: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria
title_short: (2480) Alcaria - 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria
description: Outdoor nature place with picnic area. We spent a very quiet day among the pines. Road nearby . A nice little place for a break.

address.street: 118 Rua Manuel João Luís Salgueiro Alcaria

title: () - 4
description: Mountain bike center with shower and toilet, very clean parking lot

title: (2025) Tremês - 17 Rua de Santiago
description: Free Water and air for the tires available, next to a bakery, cafe, gas station and car wash

title: (2330) Entroncamento - Rua Diogo Cāo
description: Many truck drivers park here, shopping center E.leclerc

title: (2330) Entroncamento - 65 Rua Gustave Eiffel
description: New urban park with lots of space for parking, low traffic. Great to walk the dog and do some clean up and maintnaince. Nearby to the highway, may be a bit noisy to sleep.

title: (2495-557) Fátima - 181 Avenida Irmã Lúcia de Jesus
title_short: (2495-557) Fátima - 181 Avenida Irmã Lúcia de Jesus
description: Public toilets

name: Casa HNobre
title: (2000-736) Casa HNobre
description:
Private place to park a Van or Motorhome (<6m and 2m high) day 
or night. Water and electricity provided. 
Free WiFi. 
Swimming pool.
Wonderful sunset to enjoy and relax.

title: (2495) Fátima - Rua da Charneca
description: In a small road on the outskirts of Fatima, it does not seem to be private (no signs) any time there is a property a little further but it seems that it is a secondary access (field). Possible to park on the side in the annex path where between the trees ... We will spend the night and tell you the result as soon as possible :) .. Very good night in peace, I advise for an evening

title: (2150) Golegã - 43 Rua Timor Lorosae
description: Service terminal at the Intermarché da Golegã

title: (2150) Golegã - Rua dos Castelões
description:
Grátis, calmo, tranquilo e seguro. Sem serviços. Bom para pernoita durante a feira da Golegã, embora concorrido. A 5 minutos a pé do centro da Cidade.

Free, quiet, quiet and safe. No services. Good for overnight stay during the fair of Golegã, although crowded. 5 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (2495-401) Fátima - 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva
title_short: (2495-401) Fátima - 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva
description: Very large free car park near the sanctuary. No delimited places but a lot of places in the shade, paying attention to the height of the branches. Much more accessible than car parks 2 to 7 which fill up quickly.

address.street: 96 Avenida de Dom José Alves Correia da Silva

title: (2495) - 15 Rua das Grutas da Moeda
description: Ample free parking in the Grutas da Moeda. There is a snack bar and restrooms. It is not allowed to stay overnight. Services: water, discharge and disposal of toilet.

title: (2495-032) São Mamede - 1 Rua de São Martinho
title_short: (2495-032) São Mamede - 1 Rua de São Martinho
description: Quiet, peaceful Aire with full services. Overnight is welcome. Many thanks to the small community. The coffee, breakfast and freshly baked hot breads at "Padrio Heleno" were wonderful. The only place to eat in this small village is "Marmita Do Ze Grande-Fatima" which is an "eat all you want buffet"  (good selection of home-cooked foods at an amazing price). Excellent.

title: (2330) Entroncamento - 1 Avenida das Forças Armadas
description: Parking for camper van, safety could spend the night . Near to a green park, ASA - Entroncamento

title: (2495-032) São Mamede - 2 Rua José dos Santos
title_short: (2495-032) São Mamede - 2 Rua José dos Santos
description: Maria Sabão - Lavandaria Self-Service Neat neat self-service laundry. 3 washing machines of which 2x 11kg and 1x 18kg and 2 large dryers.

name: Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
title: (2480) Campo de Futebol da Bezerra
description: It is a place at the start of the Ecopista walk. There is a playground and a football field. It is outdated on the one hand, but the facilities for motorhomes seem very new. There are toilets but they are closed. There is also a place to bbq, but no idea if that can be used. Water works. Everything for free.

title: (2330) Entroncamento - 89 Avenida das Forças Armadas
description: Nice little swimming pool that we used for a (warm) shower on the way through.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 226 N243
description: Location at the edge of the road ideal for two camper because if no cars on top beautiful view, however noisy in the morning with cars that roll at high speed but repairs very well for one night.

title: (2480) - 13 Rua da Lagoa Grande
description: To spend a quiet night in the natural park, by a lake. There are very clean public toilets, tables, a barbecue, water.

name: Câmara Municipal da Golegã - Município da Golegã
title: (2150-269) Câmara Municipal da Golegã - Município da Golegã
title_short: (2150-269) Câmara Municipal da Golegã - Município da Golegã
description: Municipal campsite of Golegã. Beautiful, quiet municipal campground in the village, near the Igreja. Space levels for many motorhomes. Bird watching. Large clean bathrooms, hot water, full services. The reception closes at 5:00 p.m. ⚠️

title: (2350) - 1 Rua dos Moinhos
description: Beautiful place in the middle of old mills with picnic tables enjoying a beautiful view from above over the valley, we spent one night there with our children without problem, no service.

title: (2495) Fátima - 25 Rua João Paulo II
description: Large free parking with some trees. I do not think that spending the night is disturbing. Provide holds.

title: (2350) - Estrada das Moreiras
description: Unpaved road in the eucalyptus and pine forest. Good for one night, fom campers only up to 6m.

title: (2495-448) Fátima - 123 Avenida Beato Nuno
description: Self-service laundry.

title: (2495) Fátima - Parque do Santuário
description: Nice parking spot. Just behind the sanctuary of Fátima. Very quiet place. No noise. High security.

title: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
title_short: (2495-401) Fátima - 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo
description: Fatima Parking available for visits. It is true that the number of "camper" places is limited, but apart from "important events and busy days" it is tolerated to park in the "car" parking lot, obviously taking care not to get in the way. In May 2019 the barriers were therefore open and nothing to pay, we stayed one night. Thanks to Fatima for her welcome. SPECIFIC: There are 14 or 15 parking spaces around the site where there is really space, we were in parking lot number 6

address.street: 50 Rua de São Vicente de Paulo

title: (2150-034) Azinhaga - 3 Rua da Misericórdia
description:
Parque da igreja matriz da Azinhaga.
Picnic area with grill, sink, water tap and electricity. Has picnic tables by a small river where you can see some birds. Very quiet.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: This is a nice place to have a lunch. And see the Ribatejo

title: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal -
description: Stabilized parking with view for 2 motorhomes. Wind turbines nearby.

title: (2150-020) Azinhaga - 50 Rua Catarina Eufémia
description: Quiet parking lot on the outskirts of the village, next to a cemetery. The parking lot belongs to the adjacent residential building but is obviously not used much. The people here are very friendly and helpful. The night was very quiet, I felt safe.

title: (2260) Moita do Norte - 71 Rua Salgueiro Maia
title_short: (2260) Moita do Norte - 71 Rua Salgueiro Maia
description: Intermarche park, laundry machine with coin, could park day and night, gas station, park outside.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - Unnamed Road
description: Moinho da Cabeça da Vaca it's a magical place with a chilling sunset. It has picnic tables and it is a typical mill in the region where flour was once milled to make bread.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 210 Estrada Principal
description: Rest area, located on a mixed parking lot, with greenery, several picnic tables and even a barbecue. 2 km from Porto de Mòs. Facing a small country road, quite quiet. Possibility to spend the day or even the night there. No service. At the start of a beautiful hike (10 km).

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - LH Rua Francisco Serra Frazão
description: Park next to Santa Casa da Misericórdia. Quieter than ASA, because ASA is next to the road. Parking and overnight stay allowed, except on fair days.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480
description: Large pitches with water and possibility of draining gray and black water. Leisure park with picnic tables, miniature golf, ice rink and beautiful and spacious children's play areas. Next to a busy road during the day. There is clean spring water across the street. The facilities here are very good. With abuse, no electricity.

address.street: Av. Dr. Licinio Moreira da Silva 2480

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 3 Largo do Rossio
description:
Free public toilets and showers including changing table. Very clean. Open from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. Bad parking. It is best to use the parking lot on the opposite side of the park.
Not open on WEEKENDS!

title: (2495-407) Fátima - 142 Estrada de Leiria
description: LPG station

title: (2480) Alqueidão da Serra - 297 Rua Porto de Mós
title_short: (2480) Alqueidão da Serra - 297 Rua Porto de Mós
description: Very nice water point with tap on the side of the road. good flow

title: (2040-153) Fráguas - R. Principal
description: Small picnic area with barbecue available and fountain with several drinking water taps. WC but which was locked today

title: (2480-303) Porto de Mós - Rua do Rio Alcaide
title_short: (2480-303) Porto de Mós - Rua do Rio Alcaide
description: Washing machines at the Intermarche parking lot

title: (2440-208) - Rua do Malhadouro
description: Small quiet spot, clearing along the path (very infrequent) place for 2/3 cc or more or less flat vans 50m from the climbing walls. No service

title: (2140) Chamusca - Avenida Dr. João Isidro dos Reis
title_short: (2140) Chamusca - Avenida Dr. João Isidro dos Reis
description: Very nice, clean and quiet place.

address.street: Avenida Dr. João Isidro dos Reis

title: (2000) Vale de Figueira - Unnamed Road
description: Shaded site at the end of a rural road with a source (uncontrolled) on the edge of a tributary of the Tagus

title: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 15 Estrada de Fátima
title_short: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 15 Estrada de Fátima
description: Super point of view at the exit of Fatima, behind a restaurant but not private, easy to maneuver (kind of roundabout) surely cool for a meal and a night

title: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal - R. do Malhadouro
title_short: (2440) Reguengo do Fetal - R. do Malhadouro
description: Similar to the spot just up the road but with full mobile coverage (3 bars of 4g). Space for 2 vans. 10 minute walk from the climbing. Nice views. Quiet, peaceful.

title: (2260-396) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 56C Rua Benvinda da Conceição Pereira
title_short: (2260-396) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 56C Rua Benvinda da Conceição Pereira
description:
Lavandaria
has TV, WiFi and gym equipment

title: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 6a Travessa Nossa Senhora do Fetal
title_short: (2440-208) Reguengo do Fetal - 6a Travessa Nossa Senhora do Fetal
description: If the other sites, on the way to the climb, are taken, there is the cemetery car park, quiet, fairly flat. Please leave the site clean for locals and hedgehogs.

title: () - Rua do Barreiro
description: Nature, panorama and tranquility! Corner to explore! Other places surely as nice as this one, chosen at random when leaving the summit route. Worth a visit for the villages with countless small stone walls characteristic of the place. In the heights of the natural park with magnificent views of the plains and surely on the Nazaré Sea (for us covered by a cloud bank in the distance). The site is at the entrance to one of the park's hikes, and has a pretty stone vestige and two uninhabited houses (one of which is open to the winds) in the middle of the pines. Not a cat in the middle of August, seems very little frequented (the foot!). Windy, very pleasant in hot weather, a little less on an evening of bad weather.

title: (2150) Golegã -
description: Nice place far enough from the bridge to sleep peacefully.

title: () Santarém - Unnamed Road
description: Here you can stand 4x4 in the riverbed, close to the water or up next to the path where it can be Dusty but if cars drive past. On the weekend possibly heavily visited by the locals. Our stay mid oct during the week was very pleasantly quiet.

title: (2480) Porto de Mós - 26 Rua Serra dos Candeiros
title_short: (2480) Porto de Mós - 26 Rua Serra dos Candeiros
description: Acesso através de terra Batida mas transitável, ótima vista e muito sossegado, tem 6 mesas pic nic e 2 barbecues.Sem água nem Wc.

title: () Vila Nova da Barquinha - EM1190
description: Very quiet place at night, next to a beautiful park and by the river. Parking and cobblestone pavement, but no traffic at night. Free wifi working only during the day. Well-done and free service area.

title: (2140) Chamusca - 4 N118
description: Free full service served by intermarche. the service is located in the supermarket car park.

title: (2490) Ourém - Largo Santa Teresa de Ourém
title_short: (2490) Ourém - Largo Santa Teresa de Ourém
description: Car park easily accessible to 7 m motorhomes, space for half a turn and back by the same road.

title: (2490) Ourém - 1 Rua da Bela Vista
description: Simple parking provided for coach but without motorhome ban. Ideal for visiting a medieval castle and "city" inaccessible by camper (because streets limit the width to 2 m). Impossible to sleep there because very steep.

title: (2140) Ariolas - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place next to the river, ideal to spend a night.

title: (2140) - Unnamed Road
description: A deserted road right on the river. Really beautiful spot. It's down a little side road

title: (2150) Golegã -
description: Accessible by 4x4 or can be a small van because the path to access it is in very poor condition. Very calm, beautiful sunset over the Tagus, and the ballet of hunting fish

title: (2140) Vale de Junco - Unnamed Road
description: Nice flat picnic area with fireplace, tables and garbage can.

title: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
title_short: (2040-015) Alcobertas - Rua do Olho de Água
description: Nice picnic area with grills and sinks for washing dishes. In the building next door you'll find the toilets (didn't check if they were open. It's possible to stop even long campers, but parking is slanted.

title: (2260) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 46 Rua da Barca
title_short: (2260) Vila Nova da Barquinha - 46 Rua da Barca
description: A calm place to Pic Nic and park camper van

title: (2460) - IC2
description: Park for trucks, 24 hours dinner and serviço, with showers. in the gás station

title: (2460-615) Moleanos - Estrada Nacional 1, km 95
description: Clearance area, open from Monday to Saturday, from 9:30 am to 7:30 pm. Along with a store of accessories, liquids, Repsol gas. Store closed for lunch 1pm to 2.30pm. You can use tables and benches for picnics.  It is located on ESTRADA NACIONAL 1 - Km 95 - MOLEANOS.  Be sure to visit the motorhome utilities store on site.

title: (2480) Dinez - 47-51 Rua do Barreiro
description: I went there on the recommendation of another GPL gas station because I hadn't taken a tank adapter for my LPG tank bottle with me and I needed the right adapter for Portugal and Spain. All adapters were available there and even normal German gas bottles could be helped. In addition, the LPG price was also very cheap. So it was worth filling up there right away. Easy to reach from the IC-2, only the entrance to the gas station was a bit narrow. Turning with my 7.40 long camper was possible.

title: (2490-505) Ourém - 2 Rua Engenheiro Adelino Amaro da Costa
title_short: (2490-505) Ourém - 2 Rua Engenheiro Adelino Amaro da Costa
description:
Quiet place to reset from a trip.
Secure, near a police station. With a nice Parque to walk.

address.street: 2 Rua Engenheiro Adelino Amaro da Costa

title: (2040) - Rua dos Potes Mouros
description: Follow signs '' formacao prismaticos basalticos ''. Spot with beautiful view of the serra, very very quiet, at the foot of the volcanic rock with natural water source 50m before, and small lake hidden 200m. Shady all morning! Gravel road very passable!

title: (2490) Ourém - 7 Rua Doutor Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (2490) Ourém - 7 Rua Doutor Francisco Sá Carneiro
description: 7 rua Doutor Francisco Sa, carneiro 2490 OUREM Very large car park, on sandy land behind large covered market. Parking without problem to spend the night as the day ...

name: Casa Féteira
title: (2480-113) Casa Féteira
description:
Welcome you to our olive oil farm!

You can park your camping-car/van in our olive groove everyday of the week.

You can also ask for a guided tour of our olive mill in Portuguese, English or French, and understand how we make one of the bests olive oils of this region. From Mondays to Saturdays, between 9am and 6pm. 

You may want to order our homemade Portuguese meal and/or breakfast . 

You'll find our olive oil and other olive oil products on our shop and you'll be able to take home a piece of our portuguese culture!

We will be very happy to have you!

title: (2040) - 33 Rua São Francisco de Assis
description: In the heart of the Serras de Aire e Candeeiros Natural Park, the Chãos-Alcobertas Service Área offers parking and overnight status for 5 motorhomes, as well as water and energy supply, loading and unloading and cleaning services for 1 vehicle. It is locate in a calm and pleasant place, with a Picnic área, set in a unique landscape. In the área you have access to 4 walking routes and a wide range of cultural and leisure activities. In the surroundings there is also a panoramic restaurant.

title: (2005) Santarém - 103 N3
description: Gravel Park Place, open day and night for everybody, during the day traffic near the N3, during the night quiet, not so busy like in Santarem, looking safe over night. Lot of space, no services. Some little stores, gas station and restaurants near the place, big grocery stores like Pingo Doce not so far, also Decatlon big store 2 km nearby.

title: (2260) Tancos - 2 Avenida e Cais de Tancos
title_short: (2260) Tancos - 2 Avenida e Cais de Tancos
description: Before a parking restaurant near the river

title: (2005) Santarém - 2 Rua Professor Américo Marinho
description: Large, paved parking lot at Parque Aquatico Santatrem. Indoor pool open 10am - 7pm. Large outdoor area only from June to September. Stayed 2-3 days, no service except dumpsters. Very quiet at night, otherwise swimming. Parking space for AC planned.

name: Parque de Autocaravanas de Arripiado
title: (2140) Parque de Autocaravanas de Arripiado
description: Motorhome park, with gate, powee.Green space on the riverside in Arriado! Parking by the river very quiet

title: (2260) Tancos - Avenida e Cais de Tancos
title_short: (2260) Tancos - Avenida e Cais de Tancos
description: Free park without facilities, nice view to the Castle. Near the Tejo river.

title: (2140) - 1 Rua Conde de Murça
description: Quiet area, tap water, grill, day park, cafes, next to the Tagus.

title: (2040) Malaqueijo - 17 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
title_short: (2040) Malaqueijo - 17 Rua dos Combatentes do Ultramar
description: Picnic area in the village next to a cafe and a playground for small children. Place is under trees.

title: (2495) Leiria - Unnamed Road
description: This is an amazing little picnic parc called “Parque de Merendas da "Fonte de Peixe" - Vale Maior”. We spent 2 nights in the middle of nature, yet with 2 water fountains (one with a thread for hose). A local guy came by and even opened the toilets for us, we are not sure if they are normally open. very quiet nights alone, just nature sounds. there are rubbish containers and when you drive here, there is an asphaltic road (from direction casal dos ferreiros). we came from a different road, but it was very doable with our van, still we recomment coming from the direction mentioned.

title: (2440) Batalha - 32 Estrada do Casal Novo
description: Temporary parking area on a serviced open lane for future construction and sale of land. Slightly sloping terrain with hard parking spaces away from the city and close to some villas. the land overlooks the city at the top of the hill near a relay antenna. no service but enough for a good night's visit to the monastery the next day. no vehicle at night, only passage of a neighbor who was walking his dog. the lampposts that equip the area do not work unlike those of the nearby road.

title: (2090) Alpiarça - Unnamed Road
description: Parking lot with stalls, very rudimentary toilets, small bar, drainage grid and drinking water from the tap. Next to a river with herons and surrounded by nature, very quiet for the night and close to the village with all services.

title: (2140) Praia do Ribatejo - N118
description: Panoramic view of the Almourol Castle. There are no support services available, but for a night you can stop for a rest.

Very typical village with its wooden houses and its very rare "terrestrial" saltworks. I also recommend the Solar do Sal Restaurant and its excellent Portuguese-style chicken at very moderate prices in a beautiful rustic setting. The owner is very friendly and speaks French. I recommend

name: Quinta das Lameiras
title: (2300) Quinta das Lameiras
description: Hello friends Our humble Biological Farm with an area of ​​3ha. We are 9km from the Templar city of Tomar, 4km from the river beach of Alverangel, 2.5km from the clean water river. Train station 3km away. We can be your Uber. We have a Hostel4campers with enough space for campers, caravans and some tents. Access to private bathroom; Common interior room (40m2 with sofas, swings and area for children to play; free kitchen with large table, free fridge, only washing machine and gas stove are paid ; There is also a outdoor leisure area with swings. Electricity 10amp; Disposal of dirty water and access to drinking water. Fresh homemade bread.. We can have a traditional Portuguese meal. We look forward to welcome you. Don't hesitate to visit our profile on Instagram (quinta_das_lameiras) or FB (Quinta das Lameiras - Sº Pedro de Tomar). We have a small grocery store where you can find products from our farm and other farmers. Depending on the season we have vegetables, fruit, eggs, cottage cheese, olive oil and duck meat, lamb, chicken and turkey, rice, tuna, vinegar, etc. Being happy is the most important thing! Our backyard is the world! Love of João, Sara and Children

Price for 2 adults and 2 children up to 13 years old. €5 extra per person.
Use of the swimming pool: €2/day/person.

name: Quinta da Cavada
title: (2420-138) Quinta da Cavada
description:
Quinta da Cavada.
Somos uma família autocaravanista, amantes da natureza e dos animais, somos vegetarianos e gostamos de tudo o que é biológico e temos uma pequena horta.  Moramos numa aldeia, chamada Souto de Cima que fica nos arredores de Leiria, Portugal, onde temos a nossa casa e um pequeno santuário animal, com cabras, ovelhas, galinhas, patos, etc... também temos cães, Golden Retriever e Pastor Alemão e um gato.
Numa parte do nosso terreno, melhorámos para acolher autocaravanas, temos 4 lugares, onde podem estar á vontade, tem água potável, despejos e chuveiro de água fria. O terreno é todo vedado.
Pagamento livre, para manutenção e melhoramentos do espaço. 
Todos são bem vindos, inclusive animais, só pedimos para respeitarem o espaço, as pessoas e os animais que cá estão.
Temos a 650m minimercado, café e pastelaria.
Na Vila da Caranguejeira que fica a 2.4 kms temos restaurantes, Multibanco, Bancos, lavandaria, talhos, farmácia, cafés, mini mercados, etc...
Para visitar aqui perto temos o Cruzeiro e o Miradouro do Carril que se podem visitar numa pequena rota panoramica com vista para a Vila da Caranguejeira, temos o Vale do Lapedo, O Parque Natural da Barroca da Gafaria, etc...
Estamos a 9.7 kms do centro de Leiria, a 18 kms de Fátima, a 32 kms das praias, a 22 kms do Mosteiro da Batalha, etc...Quinta da Cavada. We are a motorhome family, nature and animal lovers, we are vegetarians and we like everything organic and we have a small vegetable garden. We live in a village called Souto de Cima which is on the outskirts of Leiria, Portugal, where we have our home and a small animal sanctuary, with goats, sheep, chickens, ducks, etc ... we also have dogs, Golden Retriever and German Shepherd it's a cat. In a part of our land, we improved to accommodate motorhomes, we have 4 places, where they can be at ease, have drinking water, dumps and cold shower. The land is all fenced. Free payment, for maintenance and space improvements. Everyone is welcome, including animals, we only ask to respect the space, the people and the animals that are here. We have a 650m mini-market, coffee and pastry. In Vila da Caranguejeira which is 2.4 km away we have restaurants, ATMs, banks, laundry, butchers, pharmacy, cafes, mini markets, etc ... To visit nearby we have the Cruzeiro and the Miradouro do Carril that can be visited on a small panoramic route overlooking the village of Caranguejeira, we have the Vale do Lapedo, the Natural Park of Barroca da Gafaria, etc ... We are 9.7 kms from the center of Leiria, 18 kms from Fátima, 32 kms from the beaches, 22 kms from Batalha Monastery, etc ...
